name: helm-yaml-lsp-client
description: Language Server Protocol support for Argo Workflows, Helm, and Kubernetes YAML

argoWorkflowsLSP.maxNumberOfProblems.description: Controls the maximum number of problems produced by the server.

argoWorkflowsLSP.trace.server.description: Traces the communication between VS Code and the language server.

scripts.build: bun build src/extension.ts --outdir dist --target node --format cjs --external vscode --sourcemap=external
scripts.watch: bun build src/extension.ts --outdir dist --target node --format cjs --external vscode --sourcemap=external --watch
